DRAFT 14-crac+0-adhoc..jdk

Uses of Class
javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException

Packages that use MidiUnavailableException 
Package Description
javax.sound.midi
Provides interfaces and classes for I/O, sequencing, and synthesis of MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) data.

  • Uses of MidiUnavailableException in javax.sound.midi

    Methods in javax.sound.midi that throw MidiUnavailableException 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static MidiDevice MidiSystem.getMidiDevice​(MidiDevice.Info info)
    Obtains the requested MIDI device.
    Receiver MidiDevice.getReceiver()
    Obtains a MIDI IN receiver through which the MIDI device may receive MIDI data.
    static Receiver MidiSystem.getReceiver()
    Obtains a MIDI receiver from an external MIDI port or other default device.
    static Sequencer MidiSystem.getSequencer()
    Obtains the default Sequencer, connected to a default device.
    static Sequencer MidiSystem.getSequencer​(boolean connected)
    Obtains the default Sequencer, optionally connected to a default device.
    static Synthesizer MidiSystem.getSynthesizer()
    Obtains the default synthesizer.
    Transmitter MidiDevice.getTransmitter()
    Obtains a MIDI OUT connection from which the MIDI device will transmit MIDI data.
    static Transmitter MidiSystem.getTransmitter()
    Obtains a MIDI transmitter from an external MIDI port or other default source.
    void MidiDevice.open()
    Opens the device, indicating that it should now acquire any system resources it requires and become operational.
